verses.verse: Then all the captains<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428>, and Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, and Jezaniah<WH3153> the son<WH1121> of Hoshaiah<WH1955>, and all the people<WH5971> from the least<WH6996> even unto the greatest<WH1419>, came near<WH5066>,

and said<WH559> unto Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030>, Let<WH8467>, we pray thee, our supplication be presented<WH5307> before<WH6440> thee<WH6419>, and pray for us unto Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, even for all this remnant<WH7611>; for we are left<WH7604> but a few<WH4592> of many<WH7235>, as thine eyes<WH5869> do behold us<WH7200>:
that Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> may show<WH5046> us the way<WH1870> wherein we should walk<WH3212>, and the thing<WH1697> that we should do<WH6213>.

Then Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> said<WH559> unto them<WH8085>, I have heard you<WH6419>; behold, I will pray unto Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> according to your words<WH1697>; and it shall come to pass that whatsoever thing<WH1697> Jehovah<WH3068> shall answer<WH6030> you<WH5046>, I will declare it unto you<WH4513>; I will keep nothing<WH1697> back from you<WH4513>.

Then they said<WH559> to Jeremiah<WH3414>, Jehovah<WH3068> be a true<WH571> and faithful<WH539> witness<WH5707> amongst us<WH6213>, if we do not according to all the word<WH1697> wherewith Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall send thee to us<WH7971>.

Whether it be good<WH2896>, or whether it be evil<WH7451>, we will obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>, to whom we<WH580> send<WH7971> thee<WH3190>; that it may be well with us<WH8085>, when we obey the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>.
And it came to pass after<WH7093> ten<WH6235> days<WH3117>, that the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto Jeremiah<WH3414>.

Then called<WH7121> he Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, and all the captains<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428> that were with him<WH5971>, and all the people from the least<WH6996> even to the greatest<WH1419>,
and said<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, unto whom ye sent<WH7971> me to present<WH5307> your supplication<WH8467> before him<WH6440>:

If ye will still<WH7725> abide<WH3427> in this land<WH776>, then will I build<WH1129> you<WH2040>, and not pull you down, and I will plant<WH5193> you<WH5428>, and not pluck you up; for I repent<WH5162> me of the evil<WH7451> that I have done unto you<WH6213>.

Be not afraid<WH3372> of<WH6440> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, of whom<WH6440> ye are afraid<WH3373>; be not afraid<WH3372> of him<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>: for I am with you to save<WH3467> you<WH5337>, and to deliver you from his hand<WH3027>.
And I will grant<WH5414> you mercy<WH7356>, that he may have mercy<WH7355> upon you<WH7725>, and cause you to return to your own land<WH127>.
But if ye say<WH559>, We will not dwell<WH3427> in this land<WH776>; so that ye obey<WH8085> not the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>,

saying <WH559>, No<WH935>; but we will go into the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, where we shall see<WH7200> no war<WH4421>, nor hear<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782>, nor have hunger<WH7456> of bread<WH3899>; and there will we dwell<WH3427>:

now therefore hear<WH8085> ye the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>, O remnant<WH7611> of Judah<WH3063>: Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, If ye indeed<WH7760> set<WH7760> your faces<WH6440> to enter<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>, and go<WH935> to sojourn there<WH1481>;

then it shall come to pass<WH2719>, that the sword, which ye fear<WH3373>, shall overtake<WH5381> you there in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>; and the famine<WH7458>, whereof ye are afraid<WH1672>, shall follow hard<WH1692> after<WH310> you there in Egypt<WH4714>; and there ye shall die<WH4191>.

So shall it be with all the men<WH582> that set<WH7760> their faces<WH6440> to go<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714> to sojourn<WH1481> there<WH4191>: they shall die by the sword<WH2719>, by the famine<WH7458>, and by the pestilence<WH1698>; and none of them shall remain<WH8300> or escape<WH6412> from<WH6440> the evil<WH7451> that I will bring upon them<WH935>.

For thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: As mine anger<WH639> and my wrath<WH2534> hath been poured forth<WH5413> upon the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, so shall my wrath<WH2534> be poured forth<WH5413> upon you<WH935>, when ye shall enter into Egypt<WH4714>; and ye shall be an execration<WH423>, and an astonishment<WH8047>, and a curse<WH7045>, and a reproach<WH2781>; and ye shall see<WH7200> this place no more<WH4725>.

Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken<WH1696> concerning you<WH7611>, O remnant of Judah<WH3063>, Go<WH935> ye not into Egypt<WH4714>: know<WH3045> certainly<WH3045> that I have testified<WH5749> unto you this day<WH3117>.

For ye have dealt deceitfully<WH8582> against your own souls<WH5315>; for ye sent<WH7971> me unto Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, saying<WH559>, Pray<WH6419> for us unto Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>; and according unto all that Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall say<WH559>, so declare<WH5046> unto us<WH6213>, and we will do it:
and I have this day<WH3117> declared<WH5046> it to you<WH8085>; but ye have not obeyed the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> in anything for which he hath sent me unto you<WH7971>.

Now therefore know<WH3045> certainly<WH3045> that ye shall die<WH4191> by the sword<WH2719>, by the famine<WH7458>, and by the pestilence<WH1698>, in the place<WH4725> whither ye desire<WH2654> to go<WH935> to sojourn there<WH1481>.
